favourite.article: Today I wake up with this song. I asked the Holy Spirit that all the words may come true in my life that I maybe cleanse from all my sins. Thank You Jesus for Your blood.
Thanks for sharing this with us â€” a wonderful prayer for God's cleansing.
Praise God for His cleansing. Be it by water or by fire, I want to be like Jesus! Bless His name He will keep me thru it all!
My greatest hymn of all times. I sing it all the time. When happy, sad, down, I thank God. Thanks for such great words.
When at work and need to be reminded of the atmosphere of prayer and praise your work supported me with just what I needed. Thank you!
I thank God for the ministry of this song to my heart. Wash, Lord, and make me clean.

Thank God for His promise of perfect of cleansing for the hungry soul. I thank Him too for making this blessed song available through you. May we share in His Eternal bliss after a lifetime of a spotless walk with Him through this filthy domain.

Dear saints, I hope this song has transform your heart as it transformed mine. Our great Redeemer has set watchmen and light bearers in this world to wake us up. He has entrusted them with His precious gospel to proclaim it to the four corners of the earth. I beseech you, therefore, for Christ sake do not let the things of this world absorb your attention.

Your music is enriching to my soul. I thank you for allowing the Lord to use you, so you can help others. Please continue praising Him, soon He will come and will not tarry. May God's blessings be with you always.
Thank you, thank you, thank you! Can't say it enough!
Your music is enriching my spritual life, I cannot play a instrument, so I play your music in worship. Thank God for your music.
